about.title: About
about.description: passionate, self-taught Frontend Engineer with over 04 years' experience developing Web and Mobile solutions. Proven skills in analysis, UI/UX, self-organization, rapid production and maintainability. Able to transform customer needs into effective business solutions and plan activities to deliver on time. Able to maintain a friendly and productive environment within teams and in interactions with customers and senior managers. Excellent oral presentation skills and ability to explain complex issues in accessible terms.
